summary:
DoorKnocker Skull Whiterun Shack Replacer NO-Religious Callers or SalesPersons SIGN_1
replaces all WhiteRun Shack doors & is visible on the inside of the doors also.
descriptionHtml:
Skull DoorKnocker Replacer - WhiteRun Shack. With No Religious Callers or Door-to-Door 
Salespersons Sign

Usual Drill (for a Replacer) extract the Zipped File to your SkyRim Install directory (ensuring 
data folder is merged with the existing one) simply delete the .nif file in meshes\\Architecture
\\WhiteRun or move them elsewhere to uninstall.

It does appear on the Door from inside too - not too sure how i could get around that really would 
have to alter the door file the game is looking for from the inside vs the outside. would 
require an .ESP perhaps via the CK.

It\'s the second mod i\'ve uploaded, so let me know if any problems, but i think it should be 
pretty well right. Wouldn\'t have thought too much could go wrong with it.
I didn\'t include the Door Texture File which i left as the default I\'d imagine that the game 
engine will be able to locate it in the default location within the SkyRim - Textures.bsa
Should be compatible with all other mods unless they specifically alter the WhiteRun Shack doors 
in other ways.

Doors replaced within Whiterun include Breezehome, the Stables, Uthgerd the Unbroken\'s, 
Ysolda\'a, Amrens & Olava the Feebles (any door of that type {Shack}
